nodes.label: Environment
nodes.details: Natural resource base: Land, Freshwater, Marine, Atmosphere, Biodiversity.
nodes.regen_details: Focus on enhancing ecosystem health: soil carbon, water quality, biodiversity as foundational.

nodes.label: Managed Inputs
nodes.details: Energy, Labour, Finance, Genetics, Fertilizers, Pesticides, Feed.
nodes.regen_details: Shift to renewable energy, focus on ecological inputs (compost), reduced synthetics, diverse seeds.

nodes.label: Production
nodes.details: Farming (Dairy, S&B, Horti), Aquaculture, Fishing.
nodes.regen_details: Regenerative practices (cover crops, no-till), integrated systems, enhanced biodiversity.

nodes.label: Processing
nodes.details: Dairy factories, Meat works, Wineries, Packhouses.
nodes.regen_details: Byproduct valorization, reduced waste/energy/water use.

nodes.label: Waste/Recovery
nodes.details: Landfills, Composting, Food rescue, Nutrient Recovery.
nodes.regen_details: Maximize nutrient return (composting, digestion), enhanced food rescue, minimize landfill.

nodes.label: Distribution
nodes.details: Transport, Storage, Wholesalers.
nodes.regen_details: Reduced food miles, low-carbon transport, reverse logistics for cycling.

nodes.label: Weekend Markets
nodes.details: Local farmers markets, community markets, seasonal markets, direct producer sales.
nodes.regen_details: Direct farm-to-consumer, seasonal produce, community engagement, minimal packaging.

nodes.label: Consumption
nodes.details: Households, Restaurants, Institutions.
nodes.regen_details: Awareness of origins, reduced consumer waste, sustainable diets.

nodes.label: Food Service
nodes.details: All food service establishments including restaurants, cafes, institutional kitchens, and catering services.
nodes.regen_details: Sustainable sourcing, waste reduction, local food partnerships, plant-forward menus, and energy-efficient operations.

nodes.label: Food Rescue
nodes.details: Food recovery programs, redistribution networks, and waste prevention initiatives.
nodes.regen_details: Enhanced food recovery and redistribution, minimizing waste and improving food access.

nodes.label: School Food Programs
nodes.details: School lunch programs, nutrition education, and food gardens in educational settings.
nodes.regen_details: School-based food and nutrition initiatives promoting healthy eating and food literacy.

nodes.label: Health Outcomes
nodes.details: Population health indicators, nutrition status, disease prevalence.
nodes.regen_details: Improved health outcomes through better food access and nutrition.

nodes.label: Nutrition Education
nodes.details: School programs, public health campaigns, dietary guidelines.
nodes.regen_details: Enhanced nutrition literacy and healthy eating behaviors.

nodes.label: Maternal & Child Nutrition
nodes.details: First 1000 days nutrition, maternal health programs.
nodes.regen_details: Improved early life nutrition and health outcomes.

nodes.label: Health Policy
nodes.details: Health system policies, nutrition guidelines, public health initiatives.
nodes.regen_details: Policies supporting health-focused food systems.

nodes.label: Food Security Policy
nodes.details: Food access policies, security programs, emergency response.
nodes.regen_details: Policies ensuring equitable food access.

nodes.label: Local Government
nodes.details: Local food policies, community planning, infrastructure.
nodes.regen_details: Local governance supporting sustainable food systems.

nodes.label: Community Food Distribution
nodes.details: Local food networks, community kitchens, food banks.

nodes.label: Food Pricing
nodes.details: Pricing mechanisms, subsidies, taxes.
nodes.regen_details: Economic incentives for healthy, sustainable food.

nodes.label: Economic Access
nodes.details: Income support, food assistance, affordability programs.
nodes.regen_details: Improved economic access to healthy food.

nodes.label: Health Monitoring
nodes.details: Health indicators, nutrition surveys, disease tracking.
nodes.regen_details: Comprehensive health and nutrition monitoring.

nodes.label: Policy Evaluation
nodes.details: Policy impact assessment, program evaluation.
nodes.regen_details: Evidence-based policy development and refinement.

nodes.label: Govt & Policy
nodes.details: MPI, MfE, Regs, Trade, Biosecurity.
nodes.regen_details: Policies supporting regen transition, circular economy focus.

nodes.label: Economy
nodes.details: Prices, $NZD, Costs, Inflation, Income.
nodes.regen_details: Valuation of ecosystem services, circular business models.

nodes.label: Society & Culture
nodes.details: Preferences, Te Ao Māori, Food security, Health.
nodes.regen_details: Alignment with Kaitiakitanga, community resilience.

nodes.label: Technology
nodes.details: AgTech, Precision Ag, Breeding, Alt proteins.
nodes.regen_details: Tech for monitoring, cycling, waste valorization.

nodes.label: Biosecurity
nodes.details: Border control, Pest/Disease incursions.
nodes.regen_details: System resilience through diversity.

nodes.label: Food Loss
nodes.details: Losses occurring during production and processing: unharvested crops, byproducts, spoilage before retail.
nodes.regen_details: Improved harvesting, byproduct valorization, upcycling.

nodes.label: Supermarkets
nodes.details: Large retail chains, national distribution networks, standardized products.
nodes.regen_details: Sustainable sourcing, reduced packaging, food waste reduction programs.

nodes.label: Grocers
nodes.details: Local and specialty food stores, independent retailers, fresh produce markets.
nodes.regen_details: Local sourcing, seasonal products, minimal packaging, community engagement.

nodes.label: Wholesalers
nodes.details: Bulk distribution to retailers, food service providers, and institutions.
nodes.regen_details: Efficient logistics, reduced food miles, sustainable packaging solutions.

nodes.label: Imports
nodes.details: International food imports, raw materials, processed goods, specialty products.
nodes.regen_details: Sustainable sourcing, reduced food miles, ethical trade practices, local alternatives.

nodes.label: Exports
nodes.details: International food exports, value-added products, commodity trading, market access.
nodes.regen_details: Value-added processing, sustainable trade, market diversification, quality standards.

nodes.label: Fertilizer Industry
nodes.details: Manufacture and supply of synthetic and organic fertilizers, nutrient blends, and soil amendments.
nodes.regen_details: Transition to bio-based and circular nutrient sources, reduced reliance on synthetics, closed-loop nutrient cycling, and minimized environmental impact.

nodes.label: Packhouses
nodes.details: Facilities for sorting, grading, packing, and storing fresh produce before processing or distribution.
nodes.regen_details: Energy-efficient operations, minimal waste, reusable packaging, and support for local supply chains.

nodes.label: Pest Management
nodes.details: Practices and products for controlling pests, diseases, and weeds in agricultural systems.
nodes.regen_details: Integrated pest management, biological controls, reduced chemical use, and ecosystem-based approaches.

examples: Improper handling → Physical damage to produce
Lack of cold chain → Quality loss
Improper sorting → Non-compliance with processing standards
Cold chain failure → Spoilage during transport
Food rescue logistics → Kitchen waste reduction
